Class TetrisBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • TetrisBoard

  • public class TetrisBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    TetrisBoard maintains the current state of the game board.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NUM_COLS
      A standard Tetris board has 10 columns.
      static int NUM_ROWS
      A standard Tetris board has 18 rows.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TetrisBoard()
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewPiece()
      Add a new random Tetris piece to the game board at grid position (0, 3).
      boolean displayBlock(int row, int col)
      Check if a block should be displayed at a certain position on the game board.
      int[] getCurPieceGridPosition()
      Get the current grid position of the falling Tetris piece.
      TetrisPiece getCurrentPiece()
      Get the current Tetris piece.
      boolean[][] getGameBoard()
      Get the game board.
      int getNumCols()
      Get the number of columns of the game board.
      int getNumRows()
      Get the number of rows of the game board.
      boolean hasBlock(int row, int col)
      Check if the game board has a filled block at a specific position.
      void landPiece()
      Update the boolean values of the game board when a piece lands by using the currentGridPosition values and the currentPiece's rotation value.
      boolean moveDown()
      Update the grid position of the current piece if moving down is valid.
      boolean moveLeft()
      Update the grid position of the current piece if moving to the left is valid.
      boolean moveRight()
      Update the grid position of the current piece if moving to the right is valid.
      int numberOfClearedRows()
      Detect and remove any rows formed.
      boolean rotateCCW()
      Rotate the current piece counterclockwise (update the rotation index) if the rotation is valid.
      boolean rotateCW()
      Rotate the current piece clockwise (update the rotation index) if the rotation is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • hasBlock

        public boolean hasBlock(int row,
                        int col)
        Check if the game board has a filled block at a specific position.
        Parameters:
        row - the row index
        col - the column index
        Returns:
        true if the game board has a filled block at a specific position

      • getCurPieceGridPosition

        public int[] getCurPieceGridPosition()
        Get the current grid position of the falling Tetris piece.
        Returns:
        an int array of length two that stores the upper left position of the falling piece

      • addNewPiece

        public void addNewPiece()
        Add a new random Tetris piece to the game board at grid position (0, 3).

      • moveRight

        public boolean moveRight()
        Update the grid position of the current piece if moving to the right is valid.
        Returns:
        true if the piece moves to the right, false otherwise.

      • moveLeft

        public boolean moveLeft()
        Update the grid position of the current piece if moving to the left is valid.
        Returns:
        true if the piece moves to the left, false otherwise.

      • moveDown

        public boolean moveDown()
        Update the grid position of the current piece if moving down is valid.
        Returns:
        true if the piece moves down, false otherwise.

      • rotateCW

        public boolean rotateCW()
        Rotate the current piece clockwise (update the rotation index) if the rotation is valid.
        Returns:
        true if the piece rotates clockwise, false otherwise.

      • rotateCCW

        public boolean rotateCCW()
        Rotate the current piece counterclockwise (update the rotation index) if the rotation is valid.
        Returns:
        true if the piece rotates counterclockwise, false otherwise.

      • landPiece

        public void landPiece()
        Update the boolean values of the game board when a piece lands by using the currentGridPosition values and the currentPiece's rotation value.

      • numberOfClearedRows

        public int numberOfClearedRows()
        Detect and remove any rows formed.
        Returns:
        the total number of rows cleared.

      • getGameBoard

        public boolean[][] getGameBoard()
        Get the game board.
        Returns:
        the game board

        public TetrisPiece getCurrentPiece()
        Get the current Tetris piece.
        Returns:
        the current Tetris piece

      • getNumRows

        public int getNumRows()
        Get the number of rows of the game board.
        Returns:
        the number of rows

      • getNumCols

        public int getNumCols()
        Get the number of columns of the game board.
        Returns:
        the number of columns

      • displayBlock

        public boolean displayBlock(int row,
                            int col)
        Check if a block should be displayed at a certain position on the game board.
        Parameters:
        row - the row index
        col - the col index
        Returns:
        true if a block (an 'X' for the text version) should be displayed, false otherwise.
